page_path_info: Will be displayed in address bar, if not specified - will be generated automatically
page_interface_info: Display full interface of page with all menus and blocks or just cpecified content
section_path_info: Will be displayed in address bar, if not specified - will be generated automatically
sure_to_delete_page_section: Are you sure want to delete page section %s?
sure_to_delete_page: Are you sure want to delete page %s?
index_page_path: If you want to use this module as default module - add, please, page with path "index" to the root section. Content of this page will be displayed on site home page
